content:
<table-wrap id="tbl2" orientation="portrait" position="float">
<label>2</label>
<caption>
<title>Previously Reported Adsorption Energies
(<italic toggle="yes">E</italic>
<sub>ads</sub>)</title>
</caption>
<oasis:table colsep="0" rowsep="0">
<oasis:tgroup cols="3">
<oasis:colspec align="left" colname="col1"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:colspec align="left" colname="col2"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:colspec align="left" colname="col3"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:thead>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry align="center">system</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center">
<italic toggle="yes">E</italic>
<sub>ads</sub>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center">ref</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
</oasis:thead>
<oasis:tbody>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>covalent
organic framework
(C6N6) as a drug delivery platform for fluorouracil</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>–28.14, −27.54 kcal/mol</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref34" specific-use="ref-style=base-text"></xref>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>polyoxometalate
compounds/nitrosourea</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>–14.10, −10.33,
−12.29 kcal/mol</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref35" specific-use="ref-style=base-text"></xref>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>COF/carboplatin</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>–13.18, −11.29 kcal/mol</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref33" specific-use="ref-style=base-text"></xref>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>2D covalent organic frameworks/anticancer
drugs</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>–16.87
to −264.95,
−139.87 kJ/mol</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref36" specific-use="ref-style=base-text"></xref>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>bilayer MSe2 and MS2 (M
= Mo, W) system for β-lapachone anticancer drug</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>–12.940, −9.085,
−6.379, −14.594 eV</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref37" specific-use="ref-style=base-text"></xref>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>C2N
surface/proteins on
BP, GR</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>– 20.6,
−20.3 kcal/mol</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref19" specific-use="ref-style=base-text"></xref>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>covalent organic framework
as smart and high efficient carrier for anticancer drug delivery</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>–17.45, −14.83 kcal/mol</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref21" specific-use="ref-style=base-text"></xref>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>C2N
surface/fluorouracil
and nitrosourea</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>–
20.6, −20.3 kcal/mol</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref22" specific-use="ref-style=base-text"></xref>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
</oasis:tbody>
</oasis:tgroup>
</oasis:table>
</table-wrap>
clean_text:
Table 2. Previously Reported Adsorption Energies (E<sub>ads</sub>)

| system | E<sub>ads</sub> | ref |
|--------|----------------|-----|
| covalent organic framework (C6N6) as a drug delivery platform for fluorouracil | –28.14, −27.54 kcal/mol | [^34] |
| polyoxometalate compounds/nitrosourea | –14.10, −10.33, −12.29 kcal/mol | [^35] |
| COF/carboplatin | –13.18, −11.29 kcal/mol | [^33] |
| 2D covalent organic frameworks/anticancer drugs | –16.87 to −264.95, −139.87 kJ/mol | [^36] |
| bilayer MSe2 and MS2 (M = Mo, W) system for β-lapachone anticancer drug | –12.940, −9.085, −6.379, −14.594 eV | [^37] |
| C2N surface/proteins on BP, GR | – 20.6, −20.3 kcal/mol | [^19] |
| covalent organic framework as smart and high efficient carrier for anticancer drug delivery | –17.45, −14.83 kcal/mol | [^21] |
| C2N surface/fluorouracil and nitrosourea | – 20.6, −20.3 kcal/mol | [^22] |

meta.name: covalent organic framework (C6N6) as a drug delivery platform for fluorouracil
bilayer MSe2 and MS2 (M = Mo, W) system for β-lapachone anticancer drug
covalent organic framework as smart and high efficient carrier for anticancer drug delivery
